content.rendered:
Canadian Chopin Festival 2010

February 26 to March 7, 2010
John Paul II Polish Cultural Centre
Mississauga, Ontario

Click Here for Festival Events

Click the links below for more information on each event:

Opening Concert
Performance Showcase For Promising Talents (Waltzes and Nocturnes)
Nocturne Master Class
Performance Showcase For Promising Talents (Mazurka and Polonaise)
Discover the Dances
Mazurka and Polonaise Master Class
Chopin’s Greatest Works
The Muses who inspired the Master
The Poet of the Piano
Chopin and Friends – Parisian Salon Recital
